parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: Voucher ID (a program open registration is successful)

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Used for API OAuth2 using to identify user permission to use api. The token info that you obtained is 2 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param to use API.

response_fields.name: voucher_id
response_fields.description: The unique identifier for the voucher you want

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: indicate error type (if error). Empty if no error

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: indicate error details (if error). Empty if no error

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

update_log.change: Optimize for details information of Request Parameter and Response Parameter
